committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To provide for more representative allocation of funds for assisted housing.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to include "available housing" and "economically disadvantaged areas" among the criteria for Federal housing assistance. Repeals the maximum allocation for nonmetropolitan Federal housing assistance.

titles.title: To provide for more representative allocation of funds for assisted housing.
